attributes.action: accept that private schools already deliver significant public benefit by saving the government £1.9bn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If private education did not exist the exchequer would need to find an extra £2bn to fund these pupils education in the state sector. The total cost of tax breaks of charitable status only comes to around £100m, so private schools already deliver a public benefit of £1.9bn a year.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
